title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.5 - Records not available for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.5 - Records not available for public inspection

State Regulations

The records enumerated in this section shall not be available
for public inspection unless the person on whose behalf these records are kept, or his duly authorized representative, signs a notarized release permitting
such disclosure. (a) Division
personnel files. (b) Blind annuity
case folders. (c) Individual case
folders. (d) War bonus
applications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8450.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
